name: Element Cards
description:
Tables are not fore everyone - that's why we decided to have these handy cards!

So what's on the cards?

  • You'll find descriptions of the 5 Elements for the Element Dice System used in games in the Element Collection!
  • Quick explanations of the rules
  • A mighty handy diagram that shows the overcoming/ destructing cycle of the 5 Elements

The Element Cards are a submission to the Five Powers Jam 2 and the Pleasure Card RPG jam!
